import React, { useState } from 'react' import './categoriesTab.scss' import MyTitle from '../../../MyTitle/MyTitle' import CategoriesConfig from '../CategoriesConfig/CategoriesConfig' import Task from '../Task/Task' const CategoriesTab = props => { const [modal, setModal] = useState(false) const removeCategory = () => { setTab(props.listItems.length > 1 ? (props.listItems[idx - 1] || props.listItems[1]).title : '') return setListItem(props.listItems.filter(e => e.title !== props.category.title)) } return (
{props.category.title}
Active tasks
{props.category.data .filter(element => !element.completed) .map(element2 => ( {element2.task} ))}
Completed tasks
{props.category.data .filter(element => element.completed) .map(element2 => ( {element2.task} ))}
) } export default CategoriesTab
